name: Beyond the Grave II (v0.9.8)
description:
This game started with the idea of taking the upgrading aspect of Nova Drift and using it with the combat style of Terraria in a top-down shooter.

Game originally made for Scratch but was taken down due to being too "violent".

Currently this game has:

  • 40 waves
  • 2 bosses
  • 115+ upgrades
  • 4 difficulty options

This game contains references to other games lol

All artwork made/recreated by https://kevinsplatter6247.itch.io
Sound effects taken from freesound.org
Packaged using Turbowarp
